entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon then becoming west 20 gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
